potions.name: Attack Augmenter
potions.description: Increase the damage of all Attack cards in your hand by 4 this combat.

potions.name: Ballistic Brew
potions.description: Your next Attack deals 100% more damage and ignores Block.

potions.name: Baneful Blend
potions.description: Your Attack cards deal 2 additional damage per debuff on their targets this combat.

potions.name: Block Booster
potions.description: Increase the Block of all Block giving cards in your hand by 4 this combat.

potions.name: Speedy Spirit
potions.description: Draw 2 cards. Next turn, draw 2 cards.

potions.name: Witch Water
potions.description: This turn, whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Weak.

potions.name: Doping Draught
potions.description: Gain 5 Strength. At the end of each turn, lose 1 Strength.

potions.name: Exotic Elixir
potions.description: Exhaust ALL your Status and Curse cards. Heal 1 HP for each card Exhausted this way.

potions.name: Lively Liquor
potions.description: Reduce the cost of 2 random cards in your hand by 1 this combat.

potions.name: Marvelous Milk
potions.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Whenever you play 5 Skills, gain 1 additional Dexterity.

potions.name: Patient Piggybank
potions.description:
Gain 12 Gold.
While held, increase this potion's Gold gain by 6 at the end of each combat.

potions.name: Poised Perfume
potions.description:
Gain 2 temporary Strength.
While held, gain 2 temporary Strength at the start of each combat.

potions.name: Prolific Potion
potions.description:
Choose a card in your hand. Add 1 copy of that card into your hand.
While held, add a copy of this potion to the rewards at the end of each combat.

potions.name: Tenacious Tea
potions.description:
Gain 8 Block.
While held, gain 4 Block at the start of each combat.

potions.name: Infernal Infusion
potions.description: Attacks deal double damage this turn.

potions.name: Magic Manipulator
potions.description: Increase the effectiveness of potions by 100% this combat.

potions.name: Metallic Mixture
potions.description:
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
While held, whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

potions.name: Miraculous Medley
potions.description:
Gain 2 Energy.
While held, add 1 Miracle into your hand at the start of each combat.

potions.name: Sanative Solution
potions.description:
Heal 10 HP.
While held, heal 2 HP at the start of each combat.

potions.name: Volcanic Vapors
potions.description:
Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
While held, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies at the start of each combat.

keywords.name: TODO
keywords.description: TODO: Make your own epic keywords
